Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains useful utility methods frequently used throughout the code.
    Author:
    Scott Sewell

    • Method Detail

      • clamp

        public static float clamp(float value,
          float min,
          float max)
        Clamps a value within a range.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to limit.
        min - the minimum value.
        max - the maximum value.
        Returns:
        the clamped value.

      • toBearing

        public static float toBearing(float angle)
        Transforms a [0, 360] angle to a [-180, 180] angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - an angle in degrees.
        Returns:
        the transformed angle.

      • toRect

        public static Rectangle toRect(Vector2 corner1,
               Vector2 corner2)
        Creates a rectangle defined by two opposite corners.
        Parameters:
        corner1 - a corner of the rectangle.
        corner2 - the opposite corner of the rectangle.
        Returns:
        a new rectangle.

      • padRect

        public static Rectangle padRect(Rectangle rect,
                float padding)
        Expands all sides of a rectangle outwards by a certain amount.
        Parameters:
        rect - the rectangle to add padding to.
        padding - the amount to push each edge outwards. Can be negative to shrink rectangle.
        Returns:
        a new padded rectangle.

      • rectContains

        public static boolean rectContains(Vector2 point,
                   Rectangle rect)
        Checks if a point is contained within a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        point - the point to check if contained.
        rect - the rectangle to check against.
        Returns:
        true if point is contained.

      • lineIntersectsRect

        public static boolean lineIntersectsRect(Vector2 lineStart,
                         Vector2 lineEnd,
                         Rectangle rect)
        Checks if a line intersects a rectangle defined by two opposite corners.
        Parameters:
        lineStart - the start of the line.
        lineEnd - the end of the line.
        rect - the rectangle to check against.
        Returns:
        true if the given line is intersecting.

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long milliseconds)
        Halts the calling thread for short time.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - how long to wait until continuing.

      • sleepToNextPeroid

        public static void sleepToNextPeroid(int period,
                     long periodStart)
        Halts the thread until the next period begins.
        Parameters:
        period - the desired period of the executing loop in milliseconds.
        periodStart - the system time in milliseconds at the start of the current period.
